comment:
Distance: 1500m Conditions: Rainy intermittently. Very flat water and very little wind. Tail current for all races (less so BV1 and GV1). Comments: Novice boats and girls 2V 8+ were 1000m. The Girls 2V8s from Lyme/Old Lyme and Stonington were exhibition.
Thank you to Lyme/Old Lyme and East Lyme for making the foggy trip to Stonington this morning!

None
regatta_display_name: NEIRA Boys & Girls Eights,Stonington, East Lyme, Lyme/Old Lyme
